title: Albert Hall Museum (Night View)
description: A stunning view of Albert Hall Museum, beautifully illuminated at night, showcasing the rich history of Jaipur.

title: Amber Fort
description: A majestic fort located on the outskirts of Jaipur, known for its stunning architecture and scenic surroundings.

title: City Palace
description: The royal residence of the Maharaja of Jaipur, City Palace is known for its beautiful courtyards, gardens, and museums.

title: Hawa Mahal
description: The iconic palace of winds, known for its intricate facade and designed to allow royal women to observe street festivals.

title: Jaigarh Fort
description: A grand fort built to protect Amber Fort, offering stunning views of Jaipur and housing the world's largest cannon on wheels.

title: Jal Mahal
description: A beautiful palace located in the middle of Man Sagar Lake, Jal Mahal is a serene site offering picturesque views.

title: Jantar Mantar
description: An astronomical observatory built in the 18th century, featuring the world's largest stone sundial and other instruments.

title: Nahargarh Fort
description: Situated on the edge of the Aravalli Hills, Nahargarh Fort offers panoramic views of Jaipur and is a popular spot for sunsets.
